channel.title: defjaf tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from defjaf.

item.description:
@daringfireball In fact, NFC payments were pretty common in the UK and EU prior to Apple Pay‚Ä¶ The claim that ‚ÄúNFC payments were used by almost no one‚Äù is US-centric and/or disingenuous, and specifically not relevant to the EU where this report originates.
@daringfireball (To be clear, the payments in the UK and EU are mostly from cards, not mobile phones, and I am pretty sure the 2017 90% number refers to phone-based transactions.)
@cosmonist @AlanHeavens üòú Although you‚Äôre missing a lone P(E) factor on the RHS!‚Ä¶
